meanings.sent1: The coplanar shapes fit perfectly together on the flat surface.
meanings.sent2: The coplanar lines on the graph never intersect.
meanings.sent3: The coplanar birds flew in perfect formation, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts and emotions seemed coplanar, all aligned and clear.
meanings.sent5: The coplanar arrangement of the furniture made the room feel spacious and organized.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring in the same plane.
meanings.sent1: The coplanar clouds floated harmoniously in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The coplanar buildings in the city skyline looked impressive.
meanings.sent3: The coplanar shadows of the trees created a mesmerizing pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent4: Their coplanar goals and aspirations led them on a shared journey.
meanings.sent5: The coplanar layers of the cake added to its visual appeal and symmetry.

meanings.definition: Being on the same plane or level.
meanings.sent1: The coplanar roads made navigation through the city straightforward.
meanings.sent2: The coplanar platforms of the train station ensured easy access for all passengers.
meanings.sent3: The coplanar steps of the staircase made it easy for the toddler to climb.
meanings.sent4: Their coplanar thoughts on the project made collaboration seamless.
meanings.sent5: The coplanar fields stretched out endlessly, creating a sense of vastness.
